tool_description: This is a RESTful API for generating color palettes and color wheels. The API provides various endpoints to retrieve available color combination schemes, generate color palettes based on a provided color, and generate color wheels with different color representations.
name: Genius Palette API
title: Genius Palette API

api_list.name: Generate Color Palette by Combination ID
api_list.description: This endpoint generates a color palette based on the provided combination ID and color input. The combination ID specifies the color combination scheme (e.g., monochromatic, complementary, triad), and the color can be in HEX, RGB, HSL, or HSV format.

api_list.name: Generate Color Wheel
api_list.description: This endpoint generates a color wheel image based on the specified color representation type (RGB, HSL, HSV, or HEX).

api_list.name: Generate Color Palettes
api_list.description: This endpoint generates various color palettes based on a provided color input. It accepts Color Name, HEX, RGB, HSL, or HSV formats.

api_list.name: Get Available Color Combination Schemes
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of all available color combination schemes in the API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://genius-palette-api.p.rapidapi.com/schemes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "genius-palette-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://genius-palette-api.p.rapidapi.com/schemes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "genius-palette-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
